title: What ever happened to Doom Bots?
body: Doom bots were introduced to the PBE server and never made it to the public.  What happened rito?

replies.body: That game mode went up on the live server a few months ago. It was just a temp game for about a week or so.

What? 

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Doom_Bots

Just like URF or Hexakill, those modes where temporal game modes.
so it used to be a game mode? but not anymore.
Every couple months they unleash a temporal game mode for about a week.  The next one is most likely next week.  Twisted Treeline Hexakill (6v6)
